Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near Cottage Grove/33rd
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, King Dr & 35th; WB: 33rd Pl, King Dr and 35th due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/33rd.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, King Drive and 35th.

Westbound buses will operate via 33rd Place, King Drive and 35th.

Allow extra travel time.
